pli-tv-kd2:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
pli-tv-kd2:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatitthiyā paribbājakā cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatitvā dhammaṃ bhāsanti.
pli-tv-kd2:1.1.4: Te labhanti aññatitthiyesu paribbājakesu pemaṃ, labhanti pasādaṃ, labhanti aññatitthiyā paribbājakā pakkhaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:1.2.1: Atha kho rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd2:1.2.2: “etarahi kho aññatitthiyā paribbājakā cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatitvā dhammaṃ bhāsanti.
pli-tv-kd2:1.2.4: Te labhanti aññatitthiyesu paribbājakesu pemaṃ, labhanti pasādaṃ, labhanti aññatitthiyā paribbājakā pakkhaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:1.2.5: Yannūna ayyāpi cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipateyyun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:1.3.1: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd2:1.3.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd2:1.3.3: “idha mayhaṃ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi ‘etarahi kho aññatitthiyā paribbājakā cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatitvā dhammaṃ bhāsanti.
pli-tv-kd2:1.3.5: Te labhanti aññatitthiyesu paribbājakesu pemaṃ, labhanti pasādaṃ, labhanti aññatitthiyā paribbājakā pakkhaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:1.3.6: Yannūna ayyāpi cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipateyyun’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:1.3.7: Sādhu, bhante, ayyāpi cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipateyyun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:1.4.1: Atha kho bhagavā rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ seniyaṃ bimbisāraṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-kd2:1.4.2: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd2:1.4.3: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd2:1.4.4: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:2.1.2: “bhagavatā anuññātā cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatitun”ti—
pli-tv-kd2:2.1.3: cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatitvā tuṇhī nisīdanti.
pli-tv-kd2:2.1.6: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatitvā tuṇhī nisīdissanti, seyyathāpi mūgasūkarā.
pli-tv-kd2:2.1.8: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:2.1.9: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd2:2.1.10: atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd2:2.1.11: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatitvā dhammaṃ bhāsitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:3.1.1: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd2:3.1.2: “yannūnāhaṃ yāni mayā bhikkhūnaṃ paññattāni sikkhāpadāni, tāni nesaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:3.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd2:3.2.2: “idha mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi ‘yannūnāhaṃ yāni mayā bhikkhūnaṃ paññattāni sikkhāpadāni, tāni nesaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:3.3.4: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho uposathaṃ kareyya, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyya.
pli-tv-kd2:3.3.8: Taṃ sabbeva santā sādhukaṃ suṇoma manasi karoma.
pli-tv-kd2:3.3.12: Yathā kho pana paccekapuṭṭhassa veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti, evamevaṃ evarūpāya parisāya yāvatatiyaṃ anussāvitaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd2:3.3.13: Yo pana bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ anussāviyamāne saramāno santiṃ āpattiṃ nāvikareyya, sampajānamusāvādassa hoti.
pli-tv-kd2:3.3.14: Sampajānamusāvādo kho panāyasmanto antarāyiko dhammo vutto bhagavatā.
pli-tv-kd2:3.3.15: Tasmā, saramānena bhikkhunā āpannena visuddhāpekkhena santī āpatti āvikātabbā;
pli-tv-kd2:3.4.2: ādimetaṃ mukhametaṃ pamukhametaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ. Tena vuccati pātimokkhanti.
pli-tv-kd2:3.4.6: ācikkhissāmi desessāmi paññapessāmi paṭṭhapessāmi vivarissāmi vibhajissāmi uttāniṃ karissāmi pakāsessāmi.
pli-tv-kd2:3.4.10: yāvatikā tassā parisāya therā ca navā ca majjhimā ca, ete vuccanti sabbeva santāti.
pli-tv-kd2:3.4.12: aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharāma.
pli-tv-kd2:3.5.2: therassa vā navassa vā majjhimassa vā, pañcannaṃ vā āpattikkhandhānaṃ aññatarā āpatti, sattannaṃ vā āpattikkhandhānaṃ aññatarā āpatti.
pli-tv-kd2:3.5.4: so deseyya, so vivareyya, so uttāniṃ kareyya, so pakāseyya saṃghamajjhe vā gaṇamajjhe vā ekapuggale vā.
pli-tv-kd2:3.5.6: anajjhāpannā vā hoti, āpajjitvā vā vuṭṭhitā.
pli-tv-kd2:3.6.1: Yathā kho pana paccekapuṭṭhassa veyyākaraṇaṃ hotīti
pli-tv-kd2:3.6.2: yathā ekena eko puṭṭho byākareyya, evameva tassā parisāya jānitabbaṃ maṃ pucchatīti.
pli-tv-kd2:3.6.6: sakimpi anussāvitaṃ hoti, dutiyampi anussāvitaṃ hoti, tatiyampi anussāvitaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd2:3.6.10: ajjhāpannā vā hoti, āpajjitvā vā avuṭṭhitā.
pli-tv-kd2:3.6.12: na deseyya, na vivareyya, na uttāniṃ kareyya, na pakāseyya saṃghamajjhe vā gaṇamajjhe vā ekapuggale vā.
pli-tv-kd2:3.7.6: Paṭhamassa jhānassa adhigamāya antarāyiko, dutiyassa jhānassa adhigamāya antarāyiko, tatiyassa jhānassa adhigamāya antarāyiko, catutthassa jhānassa adhigamāya antarāyiko, jhānānaṃ vimokkhānaṃ samādhīnaṃ samāpattīnaṃ nekkhammānaṃ nissaraṇānaṃ pavivekānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhigamāya antarāyiko.
pli-tv-kd2:3.8.2: ajjhāpannā vā hoti, āpajjitvā vā avuṭṭhitā.
pli-tv-kd2:3.8.4: āvikātabbā saṃghamajjhe vā gaṇamajjhe vā ekapuggale vā.
pli-tv-kd2:3.8.7: Paṭhamassa jhānassa adhigamāya phāsu hoti, dutiyassa jhānassa adhigamāya phāsu hoti, tatiyassa jhānassa adhigamāya phāsu hoti, catutthassa jhānassa adhigamāya phāsu hoti, jhānānaṃ vimokkhānaṃ samādhīnaṃ samāpattīnaṃ nekkhammānaṃ nissaraṇānaṃ pavivekānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhigamāya phāsu hotīti.
pli-tv-kd2:4.2.3: pakkhassa tikkhattuṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisanti, cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa.
pli-tv-kd2:4.2.7: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sakiṃ pakkhassa cātuddase vā pannarase vā pātimokkhaṃ uddisitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:5.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yathāparisāya pātimokkhaṃ uddisanti sakāya sakāya parisāya.
pli-tv-kd2:5.1.3: “Na, bhikkhave, yathāparisāya pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabbaṃ sakāya sakāya parisāya.
pli-tv-kd2:5.2.4: Kittāvatā nu kho sāmaggī hoti, yāvatā ekāvāso, udāhu sabbā pathavī”ti?
pli-tv-kd2:5.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahākappino rājagahe viharati maddakucchimhi migadāye.
pli-tv-kd2:5.3.2: Atha kho āyasmato mahākappinassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd2:5.3.3: “gaccheyyaṃ vāhaṃ uposathaṃ na vā gaccheyyaṃ, gaccheyyaṃ vāhaṃ saṃghakammaṃ na vā gaccheyyaṃ, atha khvāhaṃ visuddho paramāya visuddhiyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd2:5.4.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmato mahākappinassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—
pli-tv-kd2:5.4.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya; evameva—gijjhakūṭe pabbate antarahito maddakucchimhi migadāye āyasmato mahākappinassa sammukhe pāturahosi.
pli-tv-kd2:5.4.4: Āyasmāpi kho mahākappino bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd2:5.5.1: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ mahākappinaṃ bhagavā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd2:5.5.2: “nanu te, kappina, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd2:5.5.3: gaccheyyaṃ vāhaṃ uposathaṃ na vā gaccheyyaṃ, gaccheyyaṃ vāhaṃ saṃghakammaṃ na vā gaccheyyaṃ, atha khvāhaṃ visuddho paramāya visuddhiyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd2:5.5.5: “Tumhe ce brāhmaṇā uposathaṃ na sakkarissatha na garukarissatha na mānessatha na pūjessatha, atha ko carahi uposathaṃ sakkarissati garukarissati mānessati pūjessati?
pli-tv-kd2:5.5.6: Gaccha tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, uposathaṃ, mā no agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd2:5.5.7: Gaccha tvaṃ saṃghakammaṃ, mā no agamāsī”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:5.5.8: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā mahākappino bhagavato paccassosi.
pli-tv-kd2:5.6.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ mahākappinaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā—
pli-tv-kd2:5.6.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya; evameva—maddakucchimhi migadāye āyasmato mahākappinassa sammukhe antarahito gijjhakūṭe pabbate pāturahosi.
pli-tv-kd2:6.1.3: ‘ettāvatā sāmaggī yāvatā ekāvāso’ti, kittāvatā nu kho ekāvāso hotī”ti?
pli-tv-kd2:6.1.8: pabbatanimittaṃ, pāsāṇanimittaṃ, vananimittaṃ, rukkhanimittaṃ, magganimittaṃ, vammikanimittaṃ, nadīnimittaṃ, udakanimittaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:6.1.9: Nimitte kittetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd2:6.1.12: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho etehi nimittehi sīmaṃ sammanneyya samānasaṃvāsaṃ ekuposathaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:6.2.3: Saṃgho etehi nimittehi sīmaṃ sammannati samānasaṃvāsaṃ ekuposathaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:6.2.4: Yassāyasmato khamati etehi nimittehi sīmāya sammuti samānasaṃvāsāya ekuposathāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd2:6.2.6: Sammatā sīmā saṃghena etehi nimittehi samānasaṃvāsā ekuposathā.
pli-tv-kd2:6.2.7: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:7.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū—
pli-tv-kd2:7.1.3: atimahatiyo sīmāyo sammannanti, catuyojanikāpi pañcayojanikāpi chayojanikāpi.
pli-tv-kd2:7.1.4: Bhikkhū uposathaṃ āgacchantā uddissamānepi pātimokkhe āgacchanti, uddiṭṭhamattepi āgacchanti, antarāpi parivasanti.
pli-tv-kd2:7.1.6: “Na, bhikkhave, atimahatī sīmā sammannitabbā, catuyojanikā vā pañcayojanikā vā chayojanikā vā.
pli-tv-kd2:7.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū nadīpārasīmaṃ sammannanti.
pli-tv-kd2:7.2.2: Uposathaṃ āgacchantā bhikkhūpi vuyhanti, pattāpi vuyhanti, cīvarānipi vuyhanti.
pli-tv-kd2:7.2.6: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yatthassa dhuvanāvā vā dhuvasetu vā, evarūpaṃ nadīpārasīmaṃ sammannitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:8.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū anupariveṇiyaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisanti asaṅketena.
pli-tv-kd2:8.1.7: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, uposathāgāraṃ sammannitvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ, yaṃ saṃgho ākaṅkhati vihāraṃ vā aḍḍhayogaṃ vā pāsādaṃ vā hammiyaṃ vā guhaṃ vā.
pli-tv-kd2:8.2.3: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ vihāraṃ uposathāgāraṃ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd2:8.2.7: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa vihārassa uposathāgārassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd2:8.2.10: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:8.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṃ āvāse dve uposathāgārāni sammatāni honti.
pli-tv-kd2:8.3.5: “Na, bhikkhave, ekasmiṃ āvāse dve uposathāgārāni sammannitabbāni.
pli-tv-kd2:8.3.7: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ekaṃ samūhanitvā ekattha uposathaṃ kātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:8.4.4: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ uposathāgāraṃ samūhaneyya.
pli-tv-kd2:8.4.8: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa uposathāgārassa samugghāto, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd2:8.4.11: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:9.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṃ āvāse atikhuddakaṃ uposathāgāraṃ sammataṃ hoti, tadahuposathe mahābhikkhusaṃgho sannipatito hoti.
pli-tv-kd2:9.1.2: Bhikkhū asammatāya bhūmiyā nisinnā pātimokkhaṃ assosuṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:9.1.5: ‘uposathāgāraṃ sammannitvā uposatho kātabbo’ti, mayañcamhā asammatāya bhūmiyā nisinnā pātimokkhaṃ assumhā, kato nu kho amhākaṃ uposatho, akato nu kho”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:9.1.7: “Sammatāya vā, bhikkhave, bhūmiyā nisinnā asammatāya vā yato pātimokkhaṃ suṇāti, katovassa uposatho.
pli-tv-kd2:9.2.1: Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho yāva mahantaṃ uposathappamukhaṃ ākaṅkhati, tāva mahantaṃ uposathappamukhaṃ sammannatu.
pli-tv-kd2:9.2.4: Nimitte kittetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd2:9.2.7: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho etehi nimittehi uposathappamukhaṃ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd2:9.2.12: Yassāyasmato khamati etehi nimittehi uposathappamukhassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd2:9.2.15: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:10.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahuposathe navakā bhikkhū paṭhamataraṃ sannipatitvā—
pli-tv-kd2:10.1.6: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe therehi bhikkhūhi paṭhamataraṃ sannipatitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:11.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe sambahulā āvāsā samānasīmā honti.
pli-tv-kd2:11.1.3: “amhākaṃ āvāse uposatho karīyatu, amhākaṃ āvāse uposatho karīyatū”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:11.1.5: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, sambahulā āvāsā samānasīmā honti.
pli-tv-kd2:11.1.7: ‘amhākaṃ āvāse uposatho karīyatu, amhākaṃ āvāse uposatho karīyatū’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:11.1.8: Tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi sabbeheva ekajjhaṃ sannipatitvā uposatho kātabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:11.1.9: Yattha vā pana thero bhikkhu viharati, tattha sannipatitvā uposatho kātabbo,
pli-tv-kd2:11.1.10: na tveva vaggena saṃghena uposatho kātabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:12.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahākassapo andhakavindā rājagahaṃ uposathaṃ āgacchanto antarāmagge nadiṃ taranto manaṃ vūḷho ahosi, cīvarānissa allāni.
pli-tv-kd2:12.1.4: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, andhakavindā rājagahaṃ uposathaṃ āgacchanto antarāmagge nadiṃ taranto manamhi vūḷho.
pli-tv-kd2:12.1.7: “Yā sā, bhikkhave, saṃghena sīmā sammatā samānasaṃvāsā ekuposathā, saṃgho taṃ sīmaṃ ticīvarena avippavāsaṃ sammannatu.
pli-tv-kd2:12.2.4: Yā sā saṃghena sīmā sammatā samānasaṃvāsā ekuposathā, yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ saṃgho taṃ sīmaṃ ticīvarena avippavāsaṃ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd2:12.2.7: Yā sā saṃghena sīmā sammatā samānasaṃvāsā ekuposathā, saṃgho taṃ sīmaṃ ticīvarena avippavāsaṃ sammannati.
pli-tv-kd2:12.2.8: Yassāyasmato khamati etissā sīmāya ticīvarena avippavāsāya sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd2:12.2.10: Sammatā sā sīmā saṃghena ticīvarena avippavāsā.
pli-tv-kd2:12.2.11: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:12.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū bhagavatā ticīvarena avippavāsasammuti anuññātāti antaraghare cīvarāni nikkhipanti.
pli-tv-kd2:12.3.2: Tāni cīvarāni nassantipi ḍayhantipi undūrehipi khajjanti.
pli-tv-kd2:12.3.6: “Idha mayaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā ticīvarena avippavāsasammuti anuññātāti antaraghare cīvarāni nikkhipimhā.
pli-tv-kd2:12.3.7: Tāni cīvarāni naṭṭhānipi daḍḍhānipi, undūrehipi khāyitāni, tena mayaṃ duccoḷā lūkhacīvarā”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:12.3.9: “Yā sā, bhikkhave, saṃghena sīmā sammatā samānasaṃvāsā ekuposathā, saṃgho taṃ sīmaṃ ticīvarena avippavāsaṃ sammannatu, ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca.
pli-tv-kd2:12.4.4: Yā sā saṃghena sīmā sammatā samānasaṃvāsā ekuposathā yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho taṃ sīmaṃ ticīvarena avippavāsaṃ sammanneyya, ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca.
pli-tv-kd2:12.4.7: Yā sā saṃghena sīmā sammatā samānasaṃvāsā ekuposathā, saṃgho taṃ sīmaṃ ticīvarena avippavāsaṃ sammannati, ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca.
pli-tv-kd2:12.4.8: Yassāyasmato khamati etissā sīmāya ticīvarena avippavāsāya sammuti, ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd2:12.4.10: Sammatā sā sīmā saṃghena ticīvarena avippavāsā, ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca.
pli-tv-kd2:12.4.11: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:12.5.1: “Sīmaṃ, bhikkhave, sammannantena paṭhamaṃ samānasaṃvāsasīmā sammannitabbā, pacchā ticīvarena avippavāso sammannitabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:12.5.2: Sīmaṃ, bhikkhave, samūhanantena paṭhamaṃ ticīvarena avippavāso samūhantabbo, pacchā samānasaṃvāsasīmā samūhantabbā.
pli-tv-kd2:12.5.3: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, ticīvarena avippavāso samūhantabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:12.5.6: Yo so saṃghena ticīvarena avippavāso sammato, yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho taṃ ticīvarena avippavāsaṃ samūhaneyya.
pli-tv-kd2:12.5.9: Yo so saṃghena ticīvarena avippavāso sammato, saṃgho taṃ ticīvarena avippavāsaṃ samūhanati.
pli-tv-kd2:12.5.10: Yassāyasmato khamati etassa ticīvarena avippavāsassa samugghāto, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd2:12.5.13: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:12.6.4: Yā sā saṃghena sīmā sammatā samānasaṃvāsā ekuposathā, yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho taṃ sīmaṃ samūhaneyya samānasaṃvāsaṃ ekuposathaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:12.6.7: Yā sā saṃghena sīmā sammatā samānasaṃvāsā ekuposathā, saṃgho taṃ sīmaṃ samūhanati samānasaṃvāsaṃ ekuposathaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:12.6.8: Yassāyasmato khamati etissā sīmāya samānasaṃvāsāya ekuposathāya samugghāto, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd2:12.6.10: Samūhatā sā sīmā saṃghena samānasaṃvāsā ekuposathā.
pli-tv-kd2:12.6.11: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:12.7.1: “Asammatāya, bhikkhave, sīmāya aṭṭhapitāya, yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati, yā tassa vā gāmassa gāmasīmā, nigamassa vā nigamasīmā, ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā ekuposathā.
pli-tv-kd2:12.7.2: Agāmake ce, bhikkhave, araññe samantā sattabbhantarā, ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā ekuposathā.
pli-tv-kd2:12.7.6: Nadiyā vā, bhikkhave, samudde vā jātassare vā yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepā, ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā ekuposathā”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:13.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindanti.
pli-tv-kd2:13.1.3: “Yesaṃ, bhikkhave, sīmā paṭhamaṃ sammatā tesaṃ taṃ kammaṃ dhammikaṃ akuppaṃ ṭhānārahaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:13.1.4: Yesaṃ, bhikkhave, sīmā pacchā sammatā tesaṃ taṃ kammaṃ adhammikaṃ kuppaṃ aṭṭhānārahaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:13.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharanti.
pli-tv-kd2:13.2.3: “Yesaṃ, bhikkhave, sīmā paṭhamaṃ sammatā tesaṃ taṃ kammaṃ dhammikaṃ akuppaṃ ṭhānārahaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:13.2.4: Yesaṃ, bhikkhave, sīmā pacchā sammatā tesaṃ taṃ kammaṃ adhammikaṃ kuppaṃ aṭṭhānārahaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:13.2.7: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sīmaṃ sammannantena sīmantarikaṃ ṭhapetvā sīmaṃ sammannitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:14.1.4: “Dveme, bhikkhave, uposathā— cātuddasiko ca pannarasiko ca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve uposathā”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:14.2.9: Tatra, bhikkhave, yadidaṃ adhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, na, bhikkhave, evarūpaṃ uposathakammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:14.2.10: Na ca mayā evarūpaṃ uposathakammaṃ anuññātaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:14.3.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yadidaṃ adhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, na, bhikkhave, evarūpaṃ uposathakammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:14.3.2: Na ca mayā evarūpaṃ uposathakammaṃ anuññātaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:14.3.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, yadidaṃ dhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, na, bhikkhave, evarūpaṃ uposathakammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:14.3.4: Na ca mayā evarūpaṃ uposathakammaṃ anuññātaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:14.3.5: Tatra, bhikkhave, yadidaṃ dhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, evarūpaṃ, bhikkhave, uposathakammaṃ kātabbaṃ, evarūpañca mayā uposathakammaṃ anuññātaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:14.3.6: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, evarūpaṃ uposathakammaṃ karissāma yadidaṃ dhammena samagganti—
pli-tv-kd2:15.1.7: Nidānaṃ uddisitvā cattāri pārājikāni uddisitvā avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:15.1.9: Nidānaṃ uddisitvā cattāri pārājikāni uddisitvā terasa saṃghādisese uddisitvā avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:15.1.11: Nidānaṃ uddisitvā cattāri pārājikāni uddisitvā terasa saṃghādisese uddisitvā dve aniyate uddisitvā avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:15.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena kosalesu janapade aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahuposathe savarabhayaṃ ahosi.
pli-tv-kd2:15.3.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sati antarāye saṃkhittena pātimokkhaṃ uddisitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū asatipi antarāye saṃkhittena pātimokkhaṃ uddisanti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.4.3: “Na, bhikkhave, asati antarāye saṃkhittena pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:15.4.5: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sati antarāye saṃkhittena pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:15.4.7: rājantarāyo, corantarāyo, agyantarāyo, udakantarāyo, manussantarāyo, amanussantarāyo, vāḷantarāyo, sarīsapantarāyo, jīvitantarāyo, brahmacariyantarāyoti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.4.8: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, evarūpesu antarāyesu saṃkhittena pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ, asati antarāye vitthārenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū saṃghamajjhe anajjhiṭṭhā dhammaṃ bhāsanti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.5.5: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, therena bhikkhunā sāmaṃ vā dhammaṃ bhāsituṃ paraṃ vā ajjhesitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū saṃghamajjhe asammatā vinayaṃ pucchanti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.6.5: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, saṃghamajjhe sammatena vinayaṃ pucchituṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:15.6.7: attanā vā attānaṃ sammannitabbaṃ, parena vā paro sammannitabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:15.7.4: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ vinayaṃ puccheyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.7.9: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ vinayaṃ puccheyyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.8.1: Tena kho pana samayena pesalā bhikkhū saṃghamajjhe sammatā vinayaṃ pucchanti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.8.2: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū labhanti āghātaṃ, labhanti appaccayaṃ, vadhena tajjenti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.8.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, saṃghamajjhe sammatenapi parisaṃ oloketvā puggalaṃ tulayitvā vinayaṃ pucchitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.9.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū saṃghamajjhe asammatā vinayaṃ vissajjenti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.9.5: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, saṃghamajjhe sammatena vinayaṃ vissajjetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:15.9.7: Attanā vā attānaṃ sammannitabbaṃ, parena vā paro sammannitabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:15.10.4: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.10.9: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.11.1: Tena kho pana samayena pesalā bhikkhū saṃghamajjhe sammatā vinayaṃ vissajjenti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.11.2: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū labhanti āghātaṃ, labhanti appaccayaṃ, vadhena tajjenti.
pli-tv-kd2:15.11.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, saṃghamajjhe sammatenapi parisaṃ oloketvā puggalaṃ tulayitvā vinayaṃ vissajjetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:16.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā codenti.
pli-tv-kd2:16.1.5: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, okāsaṃ kārāpetvā āpattiyā codetuṃ—
pli-tv-kd2:16.1.6: karotu āyasmā okāsaṃ, ahaṃ taṃ vattukāmo”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:16.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena pesalā bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū okāsaṃ kārāpetvā āpattiyā codenti.
pli-tv-kd2:16.2.2: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū labhanti āghātaṃ, labhanti appaccayaṃ, vadhena tajjenti.
pli-tv-kd2:16.2.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, katepi okāse puggalaṃ tulayitvā āpattiyā codetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:16.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū—“puramhākaṃ pesalā bhikkhū okāsaṃ kārāpentī”ti—paṭikacceva suddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anāpattikānaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe okāsaṃ kārāpenti.
pli-tv-kd2:16.3.3: “Na, bhikkhave, suddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anāpattikānaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe okāso kārāpetabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:16.3.5: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, puggalaṃ tulayitvā okāsaṃ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:16.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū saṃghamajjhe adhammakammaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-kd2:16.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena pesalā bhikkhū chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi adhammakamme kayiramāne paṭikkosanti.
pli-tv-kd2:16.5.2: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū labhanti āghātaṃ, labhanti appaccayaṃ, vadhena tajjenti.
pli-tv-kd2:16.5.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū labhanti āghātaṃ, labhanti appaccayaṃ, vadhena tajjenti.
pli-tv-kd2:16.5.8: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, catūhi pañcahi paṭikkosituṃ, dvīhi tīhi diṭṭhiṃ āvikātuṃ, ekena adhiṭṭhātuṃ—
pli-tv-kd2:16.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū saṃghamajjhe pātimokkhaṃ uddisamānā sañcicca na sāventi.
pli-tv-kd2:16.6.3: “ Na, bhikkhave, pātimokkhuddesakena sañcicca na sāvetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:16.7.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī saṃghassa pātimokkhuddesako hoti kākassarako.
pli-tv-kd2:16.7.4: ‘pātimokkhuddesakena sāvetabban’ti, ahañcamhi kākassarako, kathaṃ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd2:16.8.1: Tena kho pana samayena devadatto sagahaṭṭhāya parisāya pātimokkhaṃ uddisati.
pli-tv-kd2:16.9.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū saṃghamajjhe anajjhiṭṭhā pātimokkhaṃ uddisanti.
pli-tv-kd2:17.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena codanāvatthu tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd2:17.1.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena codanāvatthu tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd2:17.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṃ āvāse sambahulā bhikkhū viharanti.
pli-tv-kd2:17.1.4: Tattha thero bhikkhu bālo hoti abyatto.
pli-tv-kd2:17.1.5: So na jānāti uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā, pātimokkhaṃ vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ vā.
pli-tv-kd2:17.2.3: ‘therādhikaṃ pātimokkhan’ti, ayañca amhākaṃ thero bālo abyatto, na jānāti uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā, pātimokkhaṃ vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ vā.
pli-tv-kd2:17.2.6: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yo tattha bhikkhu byatto paṭibalo tassādheyyaṃ pātimokkhan”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:17.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahuposathe sambahulā bhikkhū viharanti bālā abyattā.
pli-tv-kd2:17.3.2: Te na jānanti uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā, pātimokkhaṃ vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ vā.
pli-tv-kd2:17.4.3: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahuposathe sambahulā bhikkhū viharanti bālā abyattā.
pli-tv-kd2:17.4.4: Te na jānanti uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā, pātimokkhaṃ vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ vā.
pli-tv-kd2:17.5.1: Tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi eko bhikkhu sāmantā āvāsā sajjukaṃ pāhetabbo—
pli-tv-kd2:17.5.2: gacchāvuso, saṃkhittena vā vitthārena vā pātimokkhaṃ pariyāpuṇitvāna āgacchāhī”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:17.6.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, therena bhikkhunā navaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:17.6.5: Therena āṇattā navā bhikkhū na gacchanti.
pli-tv-kd2:17.6.7: “Na, bhikkhave, therena āṇattena agilānena na gantabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:18.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā codanāvatthusmiṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā punadeva rājagahaṃ paccāgañchi.
pli-tv-kd2:18.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena manussā bhikkhū piṇḍāya carante pucchanti—
pli-tv-kd2:18.1.7: “pakkhagaṇanamattampime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā na jānanti, kiṃ panime aññaṃ kiñci kalyāṇaṃ jānissantī”ti?
pli-tv-kd2:18.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena manussā bhikkhū piṇḍāya carante pucchanti—
pli-tv-kd2:18.3.6: “aññamaññampime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā na jānanti, kiṃ panime aññaṃ kiñci kalyāṇaṃ jānissantī”ti?
pli-tv-kd2:18.4.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe nāmaggena vā gaṇetuṃ, salākaṃ vā gāhetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:19.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ajānantā ajjuposathoti dūraṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya caranti.
pli-tv-kd2:19.1.2: Te uddissamānepi pātimokkhe āgacchanti, uddiṭṭhamattepi āgacchanti.
pli-tv-kd2:19.1.9: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro thero kālavato nassarati.
pli-tv-kd2:19.1.14: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ kālaṃ sarati, taṃ kālaṃ ārocetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṃ āvāse uposathāgāraṃ uklāpaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.1.3: “kathañhi nāma āvāsikā bhikkhū uposathāgāraṃ na sammajjissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.2.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, therena bhikkhunā navaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.2.5: Therena āṇattā navā bhikkhū na sammajjanti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.2.7: “Na, bhikkhave, therena āṇattena agilānena na sammajjitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:20.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena uposathāgāre āsanaṃ apaññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.3.2: Bhikkhū chamāyaṃ nisīdanti, gattānipi cīvarānipi paṃsukitāni honti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.3.8: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, therena bhikkhunā navaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.3.9: Therena āṇattā navā bhikkhū na paññapenti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.3.11: “Na, bhikkhave, therena āṇattena agilānena na paññapetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:20.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena uposathāgāre padīpo na hoti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.4.8: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, therena bhikkhunā navaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.4.9: Therena āṇattā navā bhikkhū na padīpenti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.4.11: “Na, bhikkhave, therena āṇattena agilānena na padīpetabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:20.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṃ āvāse āvāsikā bhikkhū neva pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpenti, na paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpenti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.5.3: “kathañhi nāma āvāsikā bhikkhū neva pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpessanti, na paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.6.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, therena bhikkhunā navaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.6.5: Therena āṇattā navā bhikkhū na upaṭṭhāpenti.
pli-tv-kd2:20.6.7: “Na, bhikkhave, therena āṇattena agilānena na upaṭṭhāpetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:21.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū bālā abyattā disaṅgamikā ācariyupajjhāye āpucchiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd2:21.1.3: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, sambahulā bhikkhū bālā abyattā disaṅgamikā ācariyupajjhāye āpucchanti.
pli-tv-kd2:21.1.6: Te ce, bhikkhave, bālā abyattā aññe bāle abyatte apadiseyyuṃ, na, bhikkhave, ācariyupajjhāyehi anujānitabbā.
pli-tv-kd2:21.1.8: Te ca, bhikkhave, bālā abyattā ananuññātā ācariyupajjhāyehi gaccheyyuñce, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd2:21.2.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṃ āvāse sambahulā bhikkhū viharanti bālā abyattā.
pli-tv-kd2:21.2.2: Te na jānanti uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā, pātimokkhaṃ vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ vā.
pli-tv-kd2:21.2.3: Tattha añño bhikkhu āgacchati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito byatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd2:21.2.4: Tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi so bhikkhu saṅgahetabbo anuggahetabbo upalāpetabbo upaṭṭhāpetabbo cuṇṇena mattikāya dantakaṭṭhena mukhodakena.
pli-tv-kd2:21.2.5: No ce saṅgaṇheyyuṃ anuggaṇheyyuṃ upalāpeyyuṃ upaṭṭhāpeyyuṃ cuṇṇena mattikāya dantakaṭṭhena mukhodakena, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd2:21.3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahuposathe sambahulā bhikkhū viharanti bālā abyattā.
pli-tv-kd2:21.3.2: Te na jānanti uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā, pātimokkhaṃ vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ vā.
pli-tv-kd2:21.3.3: Tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi eko bhikkhu sāmantā āvāsā sajjukaṃ pāhetabbo—
pli-tv-kd2:21.3.4: ‘gacchāvuso, saṃkhittena vā vitthārena vā pātimokkhaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā āgacchā’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:21.3.6: No ce labhetha, tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi sabbeheva yattha jānanti uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā pātimokkhaṃ vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ vā, so āvāso gantabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:21.4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṃ āvāse sambahulā bhikkhū vassaṃ vasanti bālā abyattā.
pli-tv-kd2:21.4.2: Te na jānanti uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā pātimokkhaṃ vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ vā.
pli-tv-kd2:21.4.3: Tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi eko bhikkhu sāmantā āvāsā sajjukaṃ pāhetabbo—
pli-tv-kd2:21.4.4: ‘gacchāvuso, saṃkhittena vā vitthārena vā pātimokkhaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā āgacchā’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:21.4.6: No ce labhetha, eko bhikkhu sattāhakālikaṃ pāhetabbo—
pli-tv-kd2:21.4.7: ‘gacchāvuso, saṃkhittena vā vitthārena vā pātimokkhaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā āgacchā’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:21.4.9: No ce labhetha, na, bhikkhave, tehi bhikkhūhi tasmiṃ āvāse vassaṃ vasitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:22.1.3: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd2:22.1.7: tena gilānena bhikkhunā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd2:22.1.8: ‘pārisuddhiṃ dammi, pārisuddhiṃ me hara, pārisuddhiṃ me ārocehī’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:22.1.9: Kāyena viññāpeti, vācāya viññāpeti, kāyena vācāya viññāpeti, dinnā hoti pārisuddhi.
pli-tv-kd2:22.1.10: Na kāyena viññāpeti, na vācāya viññāpeti, na kāyena vācāya viññāpeti, na dinnā hoti pārisuddhi.
pli-tv-kd2:22.2.2: No ce labhetha, so, bhikkhave, gilāno bhikkhu mañcena vā pīṭhena vā saṃghamajjhe ānetvā uposatho kātabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:22.2.3: Sace, bhikkhave, gilānupaṭṭhākānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd2:22.2.4: ‘sace kho mayaṃ gilānaṃ ṭhānā cāvessāma, ābādho vā abhivaḍḍhissati kālaṃkiriyā vā bhavissatī’ti, na, bhikkhave, gilāno bhikkhu ṭhānā cāvetabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:22.2.6: Na tveva vaggena saṃghena uposatho kātabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:22.3.1: Pārisuddhihārako ce, bhikkhave, dinnāya pārisuddhiyā tattheva pakkamati, aññassa dātabbā pārisuddhi.
pli-tv-kd2:22.3.2: Pārisuddhihārako ce, bhikkhave, dinnāya pārisuddhiyā tattheva vibbhamati …pe…
pli-tv-kd2:22.4.1: Pārisuddhihārako ce, bhikkhave, dinnāya pārisuddhiyā antarāmagge pakkamati, anāhaṭā hoti pārisuddhi.
pli-tv-kd2:22.4.2: Pārisuddhihārako ce, bhikkhave, dinnāya pārisuddhiyā antarāmagge vibbhamati …pe…
pli-tv-kd2:22.4.4: Pārisuddhihārako ce, bhikkhave, dinnāya pārisuddhiyā saṃghappatto pakkamati, āhaṭā hoti pārisuddhi.
pli-tv-kd2:22.4.5: Pārisuddhihārako ce, bhikkhave, dinnāya pārisuddhiyā saṃghappatto vibbhamati …pe…
pli-tv-kd2:22.4.7: Pārisuddhihārako ce, bhikkhave, dinnāya pārisuddhiyā saṃghappatto sutto na āroceti, pamatto na āroceti, samāpanno na āroceti, āhaṭā hoti pārisuddhi.
pli-tv-kd2:22.4.9: Pārisuddhihārako ce, bhikkhave, dinnāya pārisuddhiyā saṃghappatto sañcicca na āroceti, āhaṭā hoti pārisuddhi.
pli-tv-kd2:23.1.3: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd2:23.1.7: Tena gilānena bhikkhunā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd2:23.1.8: ‘chandaṃ dammi, chandaṃ me hara, chandaṃ me ārocehī’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:23.1.9: Kāyena viññāpeti, vācāya viññāpeti, kāyena vācāya viññāpeti, dinno hoti chando.
pli-tv-kd2:23.1.10: Na kāyena viññāpeti, na vācāya viññāpeti, na kāyena vācāya viññāpeti, na dinno hoti chando.
pli-tv-kd2:23.2.2: No ce labhetha, so, bhikkhave, gilāno bhikkhu mañcena vā pīṭhena vā saṃghamajjhe ānetvā kammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:23.2.3: Sace, bhikkhave, gilānupaṭṭhākānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd2:23.2.4: ‘sace kho mayaṃ gilānaṃ ṭhānā cāvessāma, ābādho vā abhivaḍḍhissati kālaṃkiriyā vā bhavissatī’ti, na, bhikkhave, gilāno bhikkhu ṭhānā cāvetabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:23.2.6: Na tveva vaggena saṃghena kammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:23.3.1: Chandahārako ce, bhikkhave, dinne chande tattheva pakkamati, aññassa dātabbo chando.
pli-tv-kd2:23.3.2: Chandahārako ce, bhikkhave, dinne chande tattheva vibbhamati …pe…
pli-tv-kd2:23.3.24: Chandahārako ce, bhikkhave, dinne chande antarāmagge pakkamati, anāhaṭo hoti chando.
pli-tv-kd2:23.3.25: Chandahārako ce, bhikkhave, dinne chande antarāmagge vibbhamati …pe…
pli-tv-kd2:23.3.27: Chandahārako ce, bhikkhave, dinne chande saṃghappatto pakkamati, āhaṭo hoti chando.
pli-tv-kd2:23.3.28: Chandahārako ce, bhikkhave, dinne chande saṃghappatto vibbhamati …pe…
pli-tv-kd2:23.3.30: Chandahārako ce, bhikkhave, dinne chande saṃghappatto sutto na āroceti, pamatto na āroceti, samāpanno na āroceti, āhaṭo hoti chando.
pli-tv-kd2:23.3.32: Chandahārako ce, bhikkhave, dinne chande saṃghappatto sañcicca na āroceti, āhaṭo hoti chando.
pli-tv-kd2:23.3.34: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe pārisuddhiṃ dentena chandampi dātuṃ, santi saṃghassa karaṇīyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:24.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ tadahuposathe ñātakā gaṇhiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd2:24.1.3: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṃ tadahuposathe ñātakā gaṇhanti.
pli-tv-kd2:24.1.5: ‘iṅgha tumhe āyasmanto imaṃ bhikkhuṃ muhuttaṃ muñcatha, yāvāyaṃ bhikkhu uposathaṃ karotī’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:24.2.2: No ce labhetha, te ñātakā bhikkhūhi evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd2:24.2.3: ‘iṅgha tumhe āyasmanto muhuttaṃ ekamantaṃ hotha, yāvāyaṃ bhikkhu pārisuddhiṃ detī’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:24.2.5: No ce labhetha, te ñātakā bhikkhūhi evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd2:24.2.6: ‘iṅgha tumhe āyasmanto imaṃ bhikkhuṃ muhuttaṃ nissīmaṃ netha, yāva saṃgho uposathaṃ karotī’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:24.2.8: No ce labhetha, na tveva vaggena saṃghena uposatho kātabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:24.3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṃ tadahuposathe rājāno gaṇhanti …pe…
pli-tv-kd2:24.3.4: bhikkhupaccatthikā gaṇhanti, te bhikkhupaccatthikā bhikkhūhi evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd2:24.3.5: ‘iṅgha tumhe āyasmanto imaṃ bhikkhuṃ muhuttaṃ muñcatha, yāvāyaṃ bhikkhu uposathaṃ karotī’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:24.3.7: No ce labhetha, te bhikkhupaccatthikā bhikkhūhi evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd2:24.3.8: ‘iṅgha tumhe āyasmanto muhuttaṃ ekamantaṃ hotha, yāvāyaṃ bhikkhu pārisuddhiṃ detī’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:24.3.10: No ce labhetha, te bhikkhupaccatthikā bhikkhūhi evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd2:24.3.11: ‘iṅgha tumhe āyasmanto imaṃ bhikkhuṃ muhuttaṃ nissīmaṃ netha, yāva saṃgho uposathaṃ karotī’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:24.3.13: No ce labhetha, na tveva vaggena saṃghena uposatho kātabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:25.1.3: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd2:25.1.4: “atthi, bhante, gaggo nāma bhikkhu ummattako, so anāgato”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:25.1.6: atthi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ummattako saratipi uposathaṃ napi sarati, saratipi saṃghakammaṃ napi sarati, atthi neva sarati;
pli-tv-kd2:25.1.7: āgacchatipi uposathaṃ napi āgacchati, āgacchatipi saṃghakammaṃ napi āgacchati, atthi neva āgacchati.
pli-tv-kd2:25.2.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ ummattako saratipi uposathaṃ napi sarati, saratipi saṃghakammaṃ napi sarati, āgacchatipi uposathaṃ napi āgacchati, āgacchatipi saṃghakammaṃ napi āgacchati, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, evarūpassa ummattakassa ummattakasammutiṃ dātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:25.3.5: saratipi uposathaṃ napi sarati, saratipi saṃghakammaṃ napi sarati, āgacchatipi uposathaṃ napi āgacchati, āgacchatipi saṃghakammaṃ napi āgacchati.
pli-tv-kd2:25.3.6: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho gaggassa bhikkhuno ummattakassa ummattakasammutiṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd2:25.3.7: Sareyya vā gaggo bhikkhu uposathaṃ na vā sareyya, sareyya vā saṃghakammaṃ na vā sareyya, āgaccheyya vā uposathaṃ na vā āgaccheyya, āgaccheyya vā saṃghakammaṃ na vā āgaccheyya, saṃgho saha vā gaggena vinā vā gaggena uposathaṃ kareyya, saṃghakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd2:25.4.3: saratipi uposathaṃ napi sarati, saratipi saṃghakammaṃ napi sarati, āgacchatipi uposathaṃ napi āgacchati, āgacchatipi saṃghakammaṃ napi āgacchati.
pli-tv-kd2:25.4.4: Saṃgho gaggassa bhikkhuno ummattakassa ummattakasammutiṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd2:25.4.5: Sareyya vā gaggo bhikkhu uposathaṃ na vā sareyya, sareyya vā saṃghakammaṃ na vā sareyyaṃ, āgaccheyya vā uposathaṃ na vā āgaccheyya, āgaccheyya vā saṃghakammaṃ na vā āgaccheyya, saṃgho saha vā gaggena, vinā vā gaggena uposathaṃ karissati, saṃghakammaṃ karissati.
pli-tv-kd2:25.4.6: Yassāyasmato khamati gaggassa bhikkhuno ummattakassa ummattakasammutiyā dānaṃ—
pli-tv-kd2:25.4.7: sareyya vā gaggo bhikkhu uposathaṃ na vā sareyya, sareyya vā saṃghakammaṃ na vā sareyya, āgaccheyya vā uposathaṃ na vā āgaccheyya, āgaccheyya vā saṃghakammaṃ na vā āgaccheyya, saṃgho saha vā gaggena, vinā vā gaggena uposathaṃ karissati, saṃghakammaṃ karissati, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd2:25.4.9: Dinnā saṃghena gaggassa bhikkhuno ummattakassa ummattakasammuti.
pli-tv-kd2:25.4.10: Sareyya vā gaggo bhikkhu uposathaṃ na vā sareyya, sareyya vā saṃghakammaṃ na vā sareyya, āgaccheyya vā uposathaṃ na vā āgaccheyya, āgaccheyya vā saṃghakammaṃ na vā āgaccheyya, saṃgho saha vā gaggena vinā vā gaggena uposathaṃ karissati, saṃghakammaṃ karissati.
pli-tv-kd2:25.4.11: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:26.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahuposathe cattāro bhikkhū viharanti.
pli-tv-kd2:26.1.4: ‘uposatho kātabbo’ti, mayañcamhā cattāro janā, kathaṃ nu kho amhehi uposatho kātabbo”ti?
pli-tv-kd2:26.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahuposathe tayo bhikkhū viharanti.
pli-tv-kd2:26.2.3: “bhagavatā anuññātaṃ catunnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ, mayañcamhā tayo janā, kathaṃ nu kho amhehi uposatho kātabbo”ti?
pli-tv-kd2:26.3.2: Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena te bhikkhū ñāpetabbā—
pli-tv-kd2:26.3.5: Yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, mayaṃ aññamaññaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kareyyāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:26.3.6: Therena bhikkhunā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā te bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd2:26.4.1: Navakena bhikkhunā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā te bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd2:26.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahuposathe dve bhikkhū viharanti.
pli-tv-kd2:26.5.3: “bhagavatā anuññātaṃ catunnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ, tiṇṇannaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:26.5.5: Kathaṃ nu kho amhehi uposatho kātabbo”ti?
pli-tv-kd2:26.6.2: Therena bhikkhunā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā navo bhikkhu evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd2:26.7.1: Navakena bhikkhunā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā thero bhikkhu evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd2:26.8.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahuposathe eko bhikkhu viharati.
pli-tv-kd2:26.8.3: “bhagavatā anuññātaṃ catunnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ, tiṇṇannaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kātuṃ, dvinnaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:26.8.5: Kathaṃ nu kho mayā uposatho kātabbo”ti?
pli-tv-kd2:26.9.1: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahuposathe eko bhikkhu viharati.
pli-tv-kd2:26.9.2: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā yattha bhikkhū paṭikkamanti upaṭṭhānasālāya vā, maṇḍape vā, rukkhamūle vā, so deso sammajjitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā padīpaṃ katvā nisīditabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:26.9.3: Sace aññe bhikkhū āgacchanti, tehi saddhiṃ uposatho kātabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:26.9.4: No ce āgacchanti, ajja me uposathoti adhiṭṭhātabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:26.10.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yattha cattāro bhikkhū viharanti, na ekassa pārisuddhiṃ āharitvā tīhi pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:26.10.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, yattha tayo bhikkhū viharanti, na ekassa pārisuddhiṃ āharitvā dvīhi pārisuddhiuposatho kātabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:26.10.5: Tatra, bhikkhave, yattha dve bhikkhū viharanti, na ekassa pārisuddhiṃ āharitvā ekena adhiṭṭhātabbo.
pli-tv-kd2:27.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu tadahuposathe āpattiṃ āpanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd2:27.1.8: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tadahuposathe āpattiṃ āpanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd2:27.1.9: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd2:27.1.10: ‘ahaṃ, āvuso, itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno, taṃ paṭidesemī’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:27.2.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tadahuposathe āpattiyā vematiko hoti.
pli-tv-kd2:27.2.2: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd2:27.2.4: yadā nibbematiko bhavissāmi, tadā taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissāmī’ti vatvā uposatho kātabbo, pātimokkhaṃ sotabbaṃ, na tveva tappaccayā uposathassa antarāyo kātabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:27.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ desenti.

pli-tv-kd2:27.4.9: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā sāmanto bhikkhu evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd2:27.4.11: Ito vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissāmī’ti vatvā uposatho kātabbo, pātimokkhaṃ sotabbaṃ, na tveva tappaccayā uposathassa antarāyo kātabbo.

pli-tv-kd2:27.6.4: ‘na sabhāgā āpatti desetabbā, na sabhāgā āpatti paṭiggahetabbā’ti.
pli-tv-kd2:27.6.5: Ayañca sabbo saṃgho sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno.
pli-tv-kd2:27.6.8: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahuposathe sabbo saṃgho sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti.

pli-tv-kd2:27.7.4: Ayaṃ sabbo saṃgho sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno.

pli-tv-kd2:27.7.6: na tveva tappaccayā uposathassa antarāyo kātabbo.

pli-tv-kd2:27.9.2: Tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi eko bhikkhu sāmantā āvāsā sajjukaṃ pāhetabbo—

pli-tv-kd2:27.9.6: No ce labhetha, eko bhikkhu sattāhakālikaṃ pāhetabbo—

pli-tv-kd2:27.10.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṃ āvāse sabbo saṃgho sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd2:27.10.2: So na jānāti tassā āpattiyā nāmagottaṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:27.10.3: Tattha añño bhikkhu āgacchati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito byatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd2:27.10.4: Tamenaṃ aññataro bhikkhu yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd2:27.10.5: “yo nu kho, āvuso, evañcevañca karoti, kiṃ nāma so āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd2:27.11.2: “yo kho, āvuso, evañcevañca karoti, imaṃ nāma so āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-kd2:27.11.3: Imaṃ nāma tvaṃ, āvuso, āpattiṃ āpanno;
pli-tv-kd2:27.11.6: “na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, ekova imaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno;
pli-tv-kd2:27.11.7: ayaṃ sabbo saṃgho imaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:27.11.9: “kiṃ te, āvuso, karissati paro āpanno vā anāpanno vā.
pli-tv-kd2:27.11.10: Iṅgha tvaṃ, āvuso, sakāya āpattiyā vuṭṭhāhī”ti.
pli-tv-kd2:27.12.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno vacanena taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikaritvā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etadavoca—

pli-tv-kd2:27.12.3: Imaṃ nāma tumhe, āvuso, āpattiṃ āpannā;
pli-tv-kd2:27.12.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū na icchiṃsu tassa bhikkhuno vacanena taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd2:27.13.1: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṃ āvāse sabbo saṃgho sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti.
